subject: Horse Racing
Eight Belles (Race Horse)
Kentucky Derby
lead_paragraph: There was an outpouring of reactions to The Times’s coverage of the May 3 Kentucky Derby, in which Eight Belles broke her front ankles and was put down on the track.
snippet: There was an outpouring of reactions to The Times’s coverage of the May 3 Kentucky Derby, in which Eight Belles broke her front ankles and was put down on the track.
